name: Darker and Darker Dungeon
description:
Darker and Darker Dungeon

Useful Information Contents

1) Key
2) Background Text
3) Plants
4) How to Win and How to Lose
5) How to play

1) Key

A) Mouse Cursor.
B) Star Coin Plant selection button.
C) Star Coin Plant.
D) Star Coin Plant Score.
E) Plant Price.
F) Cool Down Timer.
G) Cactus Men Plant selection button.
H) Cactus Men Plant.
I) Firestone Plant and Health.
J) Firestone Plant Price.
K) Firestone Plant Attack!! button.

2) Background Text

In the year of our Lord 1997. The Kings debtors prison (dungeon / uranium mine), Was invaded by pan-dimensional Postal Lizard Men. They were Luddites whose jobs were downsized by automation. Now they invade other dimensions to destroy technology. Two plans were put forward to deal with the situation.

Plan A:
Seal the entrance to the debtors prison (dungeon / uranium mine) so that the Uranium slowly poisons the Postal Lizard Men to death. This plan was rejected because Postal Lizard Men might go Godzilla.

Plan B:

This is where you come in,  you are given a choice either pay poll tax (I wish if I didn't own so many poles ) or command the plant army to victory. If you win you will be given a Star Coins Plant to pay off your poll tax debt.
Good Luck !!!.

3) Plants

Star Coins Plant:

"Star Coins Plants" grows star coins (who says money doesn't grow on trees) which are automatically added to star coin score. Cactus Men Plant:
Cactus Men Plant throws zucchinis (courgettes) which are Kryptonite against Postal Lizard Men.

Firestone plant:

Firestone plants are cowardly plants, they will not advance for loyalty to the King, but for the greed of Star Coins. When they advance they will deal with multiple Postal Lizard Men. If one firestone plant dies they all flee and it's game over.

4) How to Win and How to Lose

To Win:

Succesfully advance your plant army eastwards through (dungeon / uranium mine) and destroy all pan-dimensional Postal Lizard Men (easier said than done).

To Lose:

If one firestone plant dies then all firestone plants will all flee.  The pan-dimensional Postal Lizard Men will conquer the mine, then the kingdom, then the country,  then the world, and then it's game over.

5) How to play

Darker and Darker Dungeon is Controlled by mouse.

Star Coins Plant: To place a "Star Coin Plant" on the game grid, Move the (A) cursor to the (B) "Star Coins Plant" selection button at the bottom of screen and left click the mouse. Move the cursor to the far left column of the game grid, and select a square. Release mouse and a (C) "Star Coin Plant" will be placed in the square (Once a plant have been placed on the grid they cannot be removed). (C) "Star Coins Plant" will produce star coins which will be automatically be added to your (D) "Star Coin Score". You can place another "Star Coin Plant" when you have enough star coins to buy the plant, The E) price of the plant is beneath the plant, and also the (F) cool down timer is back to 10 seconds.  

Cactus Men Plant:

To place a "Cactus Men Plant" on the game grid, Move the (A) cursor to the (G) "Cactus Men Plant" selection button at the bottom of screen and left click the mouse. Move the cursor to the second column of the game grid, and select a square. Release mouse and a (H) Star Coin Plant will be placed in the square (Once a plant have been placed on the grid they cannot be removed). You can place another "Cactus Men Plant" when you have enough star coins to buy the plant, The E) price of the plant is beneath the plant, and also the (F) cool down timer is back to 10 seconds.  

Firestone Plant:

To launch  a (I) "Firestone Plant" attack !  you must have enough Star coins which it indicated by J) the price text, changing from red to white. Now press (K ) "Firestone Plant" button, they will advance by one square and deal with multiple postal lizard men. Advance your attack by placing  "Cactus man plants" in the empty square behind them.
